input_text:
Job Title: Field Technician

Location: Olympia, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
CCI Solutions is a nationwide integrator and supplier of professional audio, video, lighting, acoustics, recording, and media products targeted to the House of Worship market. The culture within the company is family-oriented and customer focused. 50-year-old family company.As a Field Technician, you will install and service various types of professional audio, video, and lighting systems.This position typically receives overtime, weekends, evening work.Job duties. Alot of national travel - paid hotel, air bnb, food but you will be on the road a lot.*Construction background (knowledge) needed for this position.· Accurately install low-voltage wire utilizing various methods and materials according to drawings· Terminate low voltage wiring to company and industry standards· Safely rig heavy loads overhead· Accurately inventory and track job materials· Maintain a high standard of craftsmanship in all aspects of work· Safely utilize various hand and power tools· Keep and maintain a clean and organized worksite· Work well with others· Other duties as assigned Required Qualifications;· Construction background· Ability to work towards and obtain WA 06 low-voltage license· Valid driver’s license with good driving record· Desire to learn and grow in small company· Basic computer and networking skills· Ability to travel nationally up to 3-weeks at a time· Ability to acquire TSA Pre-check for air travel· Ability to work at heights using ladders, aerial lifts, scaffolding, and catwalks· Ability to lift up to 50 pounds· Ability to climb, crawl, lift, crouch and stand for long periods of time· Ability to safely operate company non-CDL truck/trailer combinations· Ability to understand and follow company policies· A background check, including drug testing is required for successful employment. Desired Qualifications;WA 06 low-voltage licenseExperience in construction, electronics, or Audio/video technical production.AVIXA CTS, CTS-I, or CTS-D certificationsAeria-lift or fork-lift certificationLong-term interest in audio video industry Company Benefits;Employer pays employees Medical, Dental and Vision Insurance.50-year-old family-owned company401K with matchingPaid HolidaysVacation and Sick payJob Type: Full-timePay: $21.00 - $28.00 per hourExpected hours: No less than 40 per week Benefits:401(k)401(k) matchingDental insuranceEmployee assistance programHealth insuranceHealth savings accountLife insurancePaid time offProfessional development assistanceRetirement planVision insuranceSchedule:8 hour shiftOvertimeWeekends as neededWillingness to travel:100% (Required)Work Location: Tumwater

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Field Technician
output_json.summary: Field Technician position at CCI Solutions, a nationwide integrator and supplier of professional audio, video, lighting, acoustics, recording, and media products targeted to the House of Worship market.
job_responsibilities: Accurately install low-voltage wire utilizing various methods and materials according to drawings
Terminate low voltage wiring to company and industry standards
Accurately inventory and track job materials
Maintain a high standard of craftsmanship in all aspects of work
Safely utilize various hand and power tools
Keep and maintain a clean and organized worksite
output_json.travel_requirements: National travel - paid hotel, airbnb, food
output_json.physical_requirements: Construction background, ability to work towards and obtain WA 06 low-voltage license, valid driver’s license with good driving record, desire to learn and grow in small company, basic computer and networking skills, ability to travel nationally up to 3-weeks at a time, ability to acquire TSA Pre-check for air travel, ability to work at heights using ladders, aerial lifts, scaffolding, and catwalks, ability to lift up to 50 pounds, ability to climb, crawl, lift, crouch and stand for long periods of time, ability to safely operate company non-CDL truck/trailer combinations, ability to understand and follow company policies
benefits: Employer pays employees Medical, Dental and Vision Insurance
output_json.company_information: CCI Solutions is a nationwide integrator and supplier of professional audio, video, lighting, acoustics, recording, and media products targeted to the House of Worship market. The culture within the company is family-oriented and customer-focused. It is a 50-year-old family company.
